lines.text: I don't have any money.
[to Dopler]
Do you have any money?
You can't ask your hostage for money!
Make it so number one.
[Zak scoffs]
What? We have Star Trek in Venezuela.
Have I told you lately how much I respect and admire you?
Buy a car? Give money to Satan? Oh!
I didn't know you knew Karate.
I don't. That was ballet.
You know what I don't like? Getting kicked in the head.
I need the room number for Dr. Gibbs.
And you are?

[placing $100 on desk]
In a hurry.
[Places $200 more on desk]
I'll see what I can do.

[gets kicked in the face by Francesca]
Limber.

[points screwdriver at Zak]
Give me the watch!
Or what? You'll adjust me to death?

[laughs]
"Adjust me to death." That's great. Give me the watch.

[to Zak]
What are you doing in there? Did you break into my house just to pee?

[to bullies]
That's a perfectly good trash can. Don't be throwing students at it.
I love my country. Now give me the watch so I can go to Costa Rica.

[holding up the watch]
Can you fix this?
Yeah. But we're gonna need some stuff you can't get at Radio Shack.

[immediately after all the excitement]
So, what do you have in mind for our next date?
